2D0000		//90				1011010000000000000000	//
2CA600		//180/2 - 180/256	1011001010011000000000	//
2C4C00		//180/2 - 180/128	1011000100110000000000	//
21C000		//3*180/8
168000		//180/4
B4000		//180/8
B400		//180/128
5a00		//180/256
0			//0
FFA600		//-180/256
FF4C00		//-180/128
F4C000		//-180/8
E98000		//-180/4
DE4000		//-3*180/8
D3B400		//-180/2-180/128
D35A00		//-180/2-180/256
D30000		//-180/2
///////
4B0000		//150 
B50000		//-150
3C0000		//120	//001111000000000000000000		
C40000		//-120	//110001000000000000000000
2D0000		//90				1011010000000000000000	//
0F0000		//30
B4000		//180/8
168000		//180/4
B4000		//180/8
0			//0
0			//0
9DEB8		//19.74
9DEB8		//19.74
168000		//180/4
168000		//180/4
